name: MerryChristmasYouFilthyAnimal
0:
”Alexa, open Filthy Animal”
”Alexa, launch Filthy Animal”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: filthy animal
des:
"Merry Christmas you filthy animal....and a happy new year!"

Are you home alone?
Do you want to fend off intruders and wannabe burglars?

This is the Skill for you! 
Say "Alexa, open Filthy Animal"

The famous quote from the Home Alone movie will immediately start playing (including gun sounds) terrifying any unsuspecting con men trying to burgle your house at Christmas or any other time of year.

"I'm gonna give you to the count of three to get your lousy, lyin', low-down, four flushing carcass OUT my door! 1... 2..."

Why not integrate this Skill into your smart home routines using the Alexa App (in supported regions only). Mix your IoT smart home devices to create the perfect intruder alarm recipe.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
